summary: Claude Code CLI: Anthropic's Programming Assistant

message.content: Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.
帮我配置全局的 git，我的名字是 zablin，邮箱是zablin18080778015@gmail.com

content.text: I'll help you configure git globally with your name and email.

input.description: Set global git username to zablin

content.text: Git global configuration is now set with your name "zablin" and email "zablin18080778015@gmail.com".

message.content: 帮我为当前项目，初始化 git

input.description: Initialize git repository in current directory

content.text: Git repository has been initialized in the current directory.

message.content: 提交并推送所有的代码

content.text: I'll help you commit and push all code. Let me first check the current status and then proceed with staging, committing, and pushing.

Add all files to staging area
